EmailTemplate.name: User Name Change
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $identityName,

Your request for name change has been completed. Please follow the instructions below:

Restart your computer and login with your new username: $userName
Your network password will remain the same.
Your new email address is: $email
It may take an hour for your new email address to start working. However, your old email address will continue to work.
If you have a Cerner account, it has been updated to your new username as well. If you have been setup for Single-Sign-On (SSO), your password will remain the same as your network password. If you are not setup for SSO, you will need to contact the helpdesk at (816) 234-3454 or ext. 53454 for your password.

DO NOT REPLY TO THIS EMAIL. THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE.
If you have any questions, contact the IAM team atIAMSVCMB@stgcmh.com.

Thanks,
The Identity Management Team
